title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
3 points are earned maximum

NOTE: Response must describe process in both. A simple description of the phases of mitosis/meiosis earns no points.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: 2 points are earned maximum

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: 4 points are earned maximum
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

4 points are earned maximum

The student response earns one of the following points:

4 points are earned maximum

The student response earns two of the following points:

4 points are earned maximum

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
4 points are earned maximum

1 point is earned each for an acceptable description including:

gametophyte is haploid

sporophyte is diploid

alternation of generations includes both a haploid stage and a diploid stage

gametophyte produces gametes/sporophyte produces spores

location on diagram or description of life cycle to show when meiosis occurs

location on diagram or description of life cycle to show when fertilization occurs

zygote results from fertilization in the gametophyte

meiosis occurs to form spore in the sporophyte

mitosis results in the formation of the multicellular sporophyte and/or gametophyte and/or sperm and egg

NOTE: No credit given for equating pollen to a spore or sperm
